name: Little white man
description: In Little White Man, you will use a samurai sword or bow and arrow to fight. Mastering the opportunity to attack and dodge is the key to kill the enemy head-on. You can also quickly solve the enemy by sneaking attacks. Flexible use of potions and skills with different effects is a skill for customs clearance. Show your skills in the ancient streets, kill enemies skillfully, and look forward to your clearance!
